data.message: Eminem such a disappointment you should just stop rapping all together every damn rhyme you spit sounds the same,its like you use to be a word wizard but now your nothing but another name! Blah blah blah you can't say anything new nothing that's true so you joined the fake media you probably should have hung that shit up and went to Trump U beings that your from Detroit you should acknowledge the good that Trump's doing in your neck of the wood's!!
